column1: #text=I was a little nervous about my plane trip , but my friend was coming with me , and that made me feel a little better .
#text=We went to the airport , and gave our bags to an attendant to be checked onto the plane .
#text=We went through the security station to make sure everything was safe , then we were ready to go to our terminal .
#text=We were there a little early , so we grabbed a bite to eat at the restaurant while we waited .
#text=When the plane arrived , we gave the attendant our tickets and got on the plane .
#text=Once we were all seated , the flight attendant went over some safety rules with us before we took off .
#text=I watched out the window as we got higher and higher .
#text=It was a little scary , but kind of fun , too .
#text=The flight attendant came by and gave us all a little snack during the flight .
#text=By the time we landed , I was n't scared anymore .
#text=We went to get our bags from the big conveyer belt and were soon on our way from the airport .
